subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Four of Michigan’s Fab Five — the first all-freshman starting five to reach the Final Four — are reuniting this weekend when the N.C.A.A. tournament comes to Detroit.
snippet: Four of Michigan’s Fab Five — the first all-freshman starting five to reach the Final Four — are reuniting this weekend when the N.C.A.A. tournament comes to Detroit.
